item.title: Are Chennai Petroleum Corporation Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Chennai Petroleum Corporation Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are positive, showing a net profit of ₹1,001.59 crores and a 21.34% increase in net sales year-on-year, alongside improved operating margins and return on equity. This reflects a strong recovery from previous challenges and enhanced profitability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Colinz Laboratories Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Colinz Laboratories Ltd's Q3 FY26 results show a slight revenue increase of 2.88% to ₹1.43 crores, but a significant net profit decline of 42.86% to ₹0.08 crores, indicating challenges in profitability and operational efficiency despite a debt-free balance sheet. Overall, the results reflect ongoing struggles in a competitive market, necessitating strategic improvements. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Nilachal Refractories Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Nilachal Refractories Ltd's latest results are concerning, showing a net loss of ₹3.53 crores despite a 55.17% increase in revenue. The company faces severe operational inefficiencies and a negative equity position, indicating significant financial distress. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are IFB Industries Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: IFB Industries Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth of 11.27% year-on-year, with net sales reaching ₹1,412.54 crores. However, profitability has declined significantly, with a 23% drop in net profit, raising concerns about operational efficiency and margin pressures. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Robust Earnings Growth Marks Dec-2025 Quarter as Majority of Stocks Report Positive Results
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has unfolded with a notable improvement in positive results, as 55.0% of the 428 companies reporting have posted favourable outcomes, marking a significant uptick from the preceding quarters. While mid and small caps continue to outperform large caps in terms of positive earnings surprises, sectoral leaders and individual standouts have emerged, painting a nuanced picture of corporate profitability and growth trends. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Loyal Equipments Ltd Drops 6.87%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Decline
item.description: Loyal Equipments Ltd’s shares declined by 6.87% over the week ending 23 January 2026, closing at Rs.176.95 from Rs.190.00 the previous Friday. This underperformance came despite the Sensex falling 3.31% over the same period, indicating a sharper drop for the stock amid weak financial results, technical deterioration, and waning institutional interest. Time: 3 hours ago

item.title: Shanthi Gears Surges 10.88% Amid Volatility and Earnings Pressure
item.description: Shanthi Gears Ltd delivered a strong weekly performance, gaining 10.88% from Rs.407.15 to Rs.451.45 between 19 and 23 January 2026, significantly outperforming the Sensex which declined 3.31% over the same period. The stock’s rally was marked by a notable intraday high of Rs.472.70 on 22 January, driven by a surge in buying interest despite mixed financial results and technical signals. This review analyses the key events and price movements shaping the stock’s volatile week. Time: 3 hours ago
